definitions: An expression used when meeting someone in person for the first time after having previously communicated only via phone, email, or other non-visual means.
examples: We've emailed for months; it's great to put a face to the name.
Hi Sarah, great to put a face to the name at last.
lemma: put a face to a name
synonyms: nice to meet you in person
source: great to put a face to the name
